snippet: Gotham Extra: Gov. Chris Christie is implying that the unemployment rate is flawed and that critics should focus on job creation. But is New Jersey really in better shape than it looks?
abstract: Gotham Extra: Gov. Chris Christie is implying that the unemployment rate is flawed and that critics should focus on job creation. But is New Jersey really in better shape than it looks?

headline.main: Christie Talks of a Comeback, but Jobs Data May Say Otherwise
